channel.title: What is Treasure Trails?
channel.description: Well, Since I got a little bit of money (like 250k) i wanted to see if I should save for full rune(g) armor. I looked it up on runehq and it said that the helm alone was 250k so i said forget it.So I tried addy which is more in my range. It said its also obtainable thru Treasure Trails lvl 3. what is that heres the link: http://runehq.com/RHQItemView.php?id=1271

item.title: What is Treasure Trails?
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

Topic: What is Treasure Trails?
easy: a lot of luck is needed. first you go kill some barbarians if you want lvl 1's (drop black t, g, and normal, also some junk) then you find a scroll, read it: "goto ...... in that house" (messages are randomly) then you goto there, find another scroll, goto the other place. keep ongoing untill you find find the chest. in the chest there are (most of them junk items) t, g, pages, beret's, cavelier and god items

if you want to go buy it, you could:

[ul][li]sell full rune and with that cash you buy black-, addy- or rune t or g
[/li][li]go chop some yew logs for cash.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: What is Treasure Trails?
item.dc:creator: @buckleyindahouse buckleyindahouse
item.description:
@buckleyindahouse wrote:

ok thank you for your help and suggestions. I had already bought full rune, ill probly think bout getting it or not later.

Read full topic

item.title: What is Treasure Trails?
item.dc:creator: @ispl_legit ispl legit
item.description:
@ispl_legit wrote:

If you want rune g or addy g your wasting your time…simply because the gold trimmed or regular trimmed armor is not better than regular rune or addy armor…its a waste of time and money…i suggest buying regular because later on your going to want that money for other ranks…just a suggestion

Read full topic

item.title: What is Treasure Trails?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

Treasure trails is for p2p players only. You kill certain monsters and they drop off a certain lvl clue scroll (lvl 1, lvl2, and lvl 3). Each clue scroll is dropped off by “harder” monsters.

go to tip.it for the best guide to it

Read full topic
